languages.text: {n}Тяжело опираясь как на костыль на насквозь латанное-перелатанное лазружье, каким-то чудом все еще не развалившееся на куски, сержант Вигастис, играя желваками, пожирает глазами Комиссара. Сам он выглядит под стать — страшные раны на руках и груди кое-как заштопаны и туго перевязаны бинтами, щедро пропитавшимися запекшейся кровью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Тяжело опираясь как на костыль на насквозь латанное-перелатанное лазружье, каким-то чудом все еще не развалившееся на куски, сержант Вигастис, играя желваками, пожирает глазами Комиссара. Сам он выглядит под стать — страшные раны на руках и груди кое-как заштопаны и туго перевязаны бинтами, щедро пропитавшимися запекшейся кровью.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Leaning heavily on an astonishingly battered lasgun held together by a long history of field repairs and providence, Sergeant Vigastes glares daggers at the Commissar with clenched teeth. The sergeant himself looks much like his weapon: the horrible wounds on his arms and chest have been hastily stitched up and tightly wrapped in bandages soaked through with now dried blood.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Тяжело опираясь как на костыль на насквозь латанное-перелатанное лазружье, каким-то чудом все еще не развалившееся на куски, сержант Вигастис, играя желваками, пожирает глазами Комиссара. Сам он выглядит под стать — страшные раны на руках и груди кое-как заштопаны и туго перевязаны бинтами, щедро пропитавшимися запекшейся кровью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Leaning heavily on an astonishingly battered lasgun held together by a long history of field repairs and a minor miracle, Sergeant Vigastes is staring daggers at the Commissar with clenched teeth. The sergeant himself looks much like his weapon: the horrible wounds on his arms and chest were hastily stitched up and tightly wrapped in bandages thoroughly soaked in dried blood.{/n}

{n}Leaning heavily on an astonishingly battered lasgun held together by a long history of field repairs and a minor miracle, Sergeant Vigastes is staring daggers at the Commissar with clenched teeth. The sergeant himself looks much like his weapon: the horrible wounds on his arms and chest were hastily stitched up and tightly wrapped in bandages thoroughly soaked in dried blood.{/n}

The sergeant himself looks much like his weapon: the horrible wounds on his arms and chest were hastily stitched up and tightly wrapped in bandages thoroughly soaked in dried blood.{/n}

The sergeant himself looks much like his weapon: the horrible wounds on his arms and chest were hastily stitched up and tightly wrapped in bandages thoroughly soaked in dried blood.{/n}

{n}Leaning heavily on an astonishingly battered lasgun held together by a long history of field repairs and providence, Sergeant Vigastes glares daggers at the Commissar with clenched teeth. The sergeant himself looks much like his weapon: the horrible wounds on his arms and chest have been hastily stitched up and tightly wrapped in bandages soaked through with now dried blood.{/n}

{n}Leaning heavily on an astonishingly battered lasgun held together by a long history of field repairs and providence, Sergeant Vigastes glares daggers at the Commissar with clenched teeth. The sergeant himself looks much like his weapon: the horrible wounds on his arms and chest have been hastily stitched up and tightly wrapped in bandages soaked through with now dried blood.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ヴィガスト軍曹は、幾度もの修理と、復旧作業によって持ちこたえた驚くほどボロボロのラスガンにもたれかかり、歯を食いしばってコミッサーを睨んでいる。軍曹自身もその武器とまるで同じような姿だ。腕と胸に負ったひどい傷は雑に縫合され、乾燥した血がたっぷり染み込んだ包帯でしっかりと巻かれていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Leaning heavily on an astonishingly battered lasgun held together by a long history of field repairs and providence, Sergeant Vigastes glares daggers at the Commissar with clenched teeth. The sergeant himself looks much like his weapon: the horrible wounds on his arms and chest have been hastily stitched up and tightly wrapped in bandages soaked through with now dried blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィガスト軍曹は、幾度もの修理と、ちょっとした奇跡によって持ちこたえた驚くほどボロボロのラスガンにもたれかかり、歯を食いしばってコミッサーを睨んでいる。軍曹自身もその武器とまるで同じような姿だ。腕と胸に負ったひどい傷は雑に縫合され、乾燥した血がたっぷり染み込んだ包帯でしっかりと巻かれていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}维加斯特军士疲惫地靠在一把破破烂烂的激光枪上。这把激光枪不知经过多少次临时修理，到现在竟然还能用，简直可以称得上是奇迹。军士咬紧牙关，恶狠狠地盯着政委。他本人看起来就像他的武器一样破烂不堪，手臂与胸口的可怕伤口被匆匆忙忙地缝合起来，用浸透了鲜血的绷带紧紧包裹着，上面的血已经干了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Leaning heavily on an astonishingly battered lasgun held together by a long history of field repairs and providence, Sergeant Vigastes glares daggers at the Commissar with clenched teeth. The sergeant himself looks much like his weapon: the horrible wounds on his arms and chest have been hastily stitched up and tightly wrapped in bandages soaked through with now dried blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}维加斯特军士疲惫地靠在一把破破烂烂的激光枪上。这把激光枪不知经过多少次临时修理，到现在竟然还能用，简直可以称得上是奇迹。军士咬紧牙关，恶狠狠地盯着政委。他本人看起来就像他的武器一样破烂不堪，手臂与胸口的可怕伤口被匆匆忙忙地缝合起来，用浸透了鲜血的绷带紧紧包裹着，上面的血已经干了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El sargento Vigastes, apoyado en un rifle láser asombrosamente maltrecho, que se ha mantenido unido gracias a un montón de reparaciones de campo y la providencia, mira como un puñal al Comisario con los dientes apretados. El propio sargento tiene un aspecto muy parecido al de su arma: las horribles heridas de sus brazos y pecho han sido cosidas a toda prisa y envueltas en vendas empapadas ahora con sangre reseca.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Leaning heavily on an astonishingly battered lasgun held together by a long history of field repairs and providence, Sergeant Vigastes glares daggers at the Commissar with clenched teeth. The sergeant himself looks much like his weapon: the horrible wounds on his arms and chest have been hastily stitched up and tightly wrapped in bandages soaked through with now dried blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El sargento Vigastes, apoyado en un rifle láser asombrosamente maltrecho, que se ha mantenido unido gracias a un montón de reparaciones de campo y a un pequeño milagro, mira como un puñal al Comisario con los dientes apretados. El propio sargento tiene un aspecto muy parecido al de su arma: las horribles heridas de sus brazos y pecho han sido cosidas a toda prisa y envueltas en vendas empapadas en sangre seca.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sergeant Vigastes stützt sich auf ein ramponiertes Lasergewehr, das von einer langen Geschichte provisorischer Reparaturen und Sparsamkeit gezeichnet ist. Er funkelt den Kommissar mit zusammengebissenen Zähnen an. Der Sergeant sieht im Grunde selbst aus wie seine Waffe: Die schrecklichen Wunden auf seinen Armen und seiner Brust wurden eilig zusammengeflickt und eng mit Verbänden umwickelt, die sich mit inzwischen getrocknetem Blut vollgesaugt haben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Leaning heavily on an astonishingly battered lasgun held together by a long history of field repairs and providence, Sergeant Vigastes glares daggers at the Commissar with clenched teeth. The sergeant himself looks much like his weapon: the horrible wounds on his arms and chest have been hastily stitched up and tightly wrapped in bandages soaked through with now dried blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sergeant Vigastes stützt sich auf ein atemberaubend ramponiertes Lasergewehr, das von einer langen Geschichte provisorischer Reparaturen im Feld und einem kleinen Wunder zusammengehalten wird. Er starrt mit zusammengebissenen Zähnen und endlosem Hass den Kommissar an. Der Sergeant selbst sieht im Grunde aus wie seine Waffe: Die schrecklichen Wunden auf seinen Armen und seiner Brust wurden eilig zusammengeflickt und eng mit Verbänden umwickelt, die sich vollständig mit inzwischen vertrocknetem Blut vollgesaugt haben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lourdement appuyé sur un fusil laser qui ne semble tenir en un seul morceau que par la grâce du hasard et de nombreuses réparations de fortune, le sergent Vigastes foudroie le commissaire du regard tout en grinçant des dents. Comme son arme, le sergent lui-même semble avoir été rafistolé à la hâte : les plaies béantes sur ses bras et son torse ont été grossièrement suturées et recouvertes de bandages imbibés de sang ayant depuis séché.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Leaning heavily on an astonishingly battered lasgun held together by a long history of field repairs and providence, Sergeant Vigastes glares daggers at the Commissar with clenched teeth. The sergeant himself looks much like his weapon: the horrible wounds on his arms and chest have been hastily stitched up and tightly wrapped in bandages soaked through with now dried blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lourdement appuyé sur un fusil laser qui ne semble tenir en un seul morceau que par la grâce d'un miracle et de nombreuses réparations de fortune, le sergent Vigastes foudroie le commissaire du regard tout en grinçant des dents. Comme son arme, le sergent lui-même semble avoir été rafistolé à la hâte : les plaies béantes sur ses bras ont été grossièrement suturées et recouvertes de bandages imbibés de sang.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Geçmişteki saha onarımları ve biraz da takdiriilahiyle bir arada duran, şaşkınlık uyandıracak kadar harap hâldeki silazerine tüm gücüyle yüklenen Çavuş Vigastes, dişlerini sıkarak Komiser'e delici bakışlar atıyor. Çavuş'un görünümü de silahından farksız duruyor: Kolları ve göğsündeki dehşet uyandıran yaralar, apar topar dikilerek artık kuruyan kanının sızdığı sargılarla sıkıca sarılmış.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Leaning heavily on an astonishingly battered lasgun held together by a long history of field repairs and providence, Sergeant Vigastes glares daggers at the Commissar with clenched teeth. The sergeant himself looks much like his weapon: the horrible wounds on his arms and chest have been hastily stitched up and tightly wrapped in bandages soaked through with now dried blood.{/n}

Çavuş'un görünümü de silahından farksız duruyor: Kolları ve göğsündeki dehşet uyandıran yaralar, apar topar dikilerek artık kuruyan kanının sızdığı sargılarla sıkıca sarılmış.{/n}
